item.title: Build a Mini Cluster
item.description: Please describe here the steps on how you build the mini cluster. Include some image. Make sure the background is white. Team Put team names here Equipmemt put list of equipment here Name Quantity Purpose Power Switch 1 Allows the cluster do be switched on and of easily Progress Week 1 Distributed mini cluster equipment Set up cluster with cloudmesh-pi-burn Get more SD Cards Add more tasks … ;-) Add more weeks … ;-) Add dates to Weeks … ;-) Add weekly meeting Add slack to web page: https://app.

item.title: Contact
item.description: NOT YET WORKING This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
